Class Lightsource

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item
      • Lightsource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Inspectable, java.io.Serializable, Nameable, Powerable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Flashlight, Lantern

    public abstract class Lightsource
extends Item
implements Powerable
    A lightsource that can be powered on. Must extend to create an actual Class.
    Author:
    Mikko Piuhola
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
